verses.verse: And there was a <S%H7458>famine<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>, <S%H905>beside<s%> the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H7458>famine<s%> that was in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%>. And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> unto <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> unto <S%H1642>Gerar<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> unto him, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Go not <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> which I shall <S%H559>tell<s%> thee of:

<S%H1481>Sojourn<s%> in this <S%H776>land<s%>, and I will be with thee, and will <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee; for unto thee, and unto thy <S%H2233>seed<s%>, I will <S%H5414>give<s%> all <S%H411>these<s%> <S%H776>countries<s%>, and I will <S%H6965>perform<s%> the <S%H7621>oath<s%> which I <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto <S%H85>Abraham<s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%>;

And I will <S%H7235>make<s%> thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> to <S%H7235>multiply<s%> as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and will <S%H5414>give<s%> unto thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> all <S%H411>these<s%> <S%H776>countries<s%>; and in thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> be <S%H1288>blessed<s%>;

<S%H6118>Because<s%> that <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and <S%H8104>kept<s%> my <S%H4931>charge<s%>, my <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and my <S%H8451>laws<s%>.
¶ And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H1642>Gerar<s%>:

And the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H7592>asked<s%> him of his <S%H802>wife<s%>; and he <S%H559>said<s%>, She is my <S%H269>sister<s%>: for he <S%H3372>feared<s%> to <S%H559>say<s%>, She is my <S%H802>wife<s%>; lest, said he, the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> should <S%H2026>kill<s%> me for <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%>; because she was <S%H2896>fair<s%> to look <S%H4758>upon<s%>.

And it came to pass, when he had been there a <S%H748>long<s%> <S%H3117>time<s%>, that <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> looked <S%H8259>out<s%> <S%H1157>at<s%> a <S%H2474>window<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%>, and, behold, <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> was <S%H6711>sporting<s%> with <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%>.

And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Behold, of a <S%H389>surety<s%> she is thy <S%H802>wife<s%>: and how <S%H559>saidst<s%> thou, She is my <S%H269>sister<s%>? And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Because I <S%H559>said<s%>, Lest I <S%H4191>die<s%> for her.

And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, What is this thou hast <S%H6213>done<s%> unto us? <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> might <S%H4592>lightly<s%> have <S%H7901>lien<s%> with thy <S%H802>wife<s%>, and thou shouldest have <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H817>guiltiness<s%> upon us.

And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H6680>charged<s%> all his <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, He that <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> this <S%H376>man<s%> or his <S%H802>wife<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>.

Then <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H2232>sowed<s%> in that <S%H776>land<s%>, and <S%H4672>received<s%> in the same <S%H8141>year<s%> an <S%H3967%H8180>hundredfold<s%>: and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him.
And the <S%H376>man<s%> waxed <S%H1431>great<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H1980>forward<s%>, and <S%H1432>grew<s%> until he <S%H1431>became<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1431>great<s%>:

For he had <S%H4735>possession<s%> of <S%H6629>flocks<s%>, and <S%H4735>possession<s%> of <S%H1241>herds<s%>, and great <S%H7227>store<s%> of <S%H5657>servants<s%>: and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H7065>envied<s%> him.

For all the <S%H875>wells<s%> which his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> had <S%H2658>digged<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>, the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H5640>stopped<s%> them, and <S%H4390>filled<s%> them with <S%H6083>earth<s%>.
And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%> from us; for thou art <S%H3966>much<s%> <S%H6105>mightier<s%> than we.
¶ And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H3212>departed<s%> thence, and pitched his <S%H2583>tent<s%> in the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H1642>Gerar<s%>, and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%>.

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H2658>digged<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H875>wells<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>, which they had <S%H2658>digged<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>; for the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H5640>stopped<s%> them <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%>: and he <S%H7121>called<s%> their <S%H8034>names<s%> after the <S%H8034>names<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> had <S%H7121>called<s%> them.
And <S%H3327>Isaac's<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H2658>digged<s%> in the <S%H5158>valley<s%>, and <S%H4672>found<s%> there a <S%H875>well<s%> of <S%H2416>springing<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>.

And the <S%H7462>herdmen<s%> of <S%H1642>Gerar<s%> did <S%H7378>strive<s%> with <S%H3327>Isaac's<s%> <S%H7462>herdmen<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H4325>water<s%> is ours: and he <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H875>well<s%> <S%H6230>Esek<s%>; because they <S%H6229>strove<s%> with him.
And they <S%H2658>digged<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H875>well<s%>, and <S%H7378>strove<s%> for that also: and he <S%H7121>called<s%> the name of <S%H8034>it<s%> <S%H7856>Sitnah<s%>.

And he <S%H6275>removed<s%> from thence, and <S%H2658>digged<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H875>well<s%>; and for that they <S%H7378>strove<s%> not: and he <S%H7121>called<s%> the name of <S%H8034>it<s%> <S%H7344>Rehoboth<s%>; and he <S%H559>said<s%>, For <S%H6258>now<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath made <S%H7337>room<s%> for us, and we shall be <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>.
And he went <S%H5927>up<s%> from thence to <S%H884>Beer-sheba<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> unto him the same <S%H3915>night<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, I am the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%>: <S%H3372>fear<s%> not, for I am <S%H854>with<s%> thee, and will <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee, and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> for my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H85>Abraham's<s%> sake.

And he <S%H1129>builded<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> there, and <S%H7121>called<s%> upon the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H5186>pitched<s%> his <S%H168>tent<s%> there: and there <S%H3327>Isaac's<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H3738>digged<s%> a <S%H875>well<s%>.

¶ Then <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to him from <S%H1642>Gerar<s%>, and <S%H276>Ahuzzath<s%> one of his <S%H4828>friends<s%>, and <S%H6369>Phichol<s%> the chief <S%H8269>captain<s%> of his <S%H6635>army<s%>.
And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H4069>Wherefore<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> ye to me, seeing ye <S%H8130>hate<s%> me, and have sent me <S%H7971>away<s%> from you?

And they <S%H559>said<s%>, We <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H7200>certainly<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was with thee: and we <S%H559>said<s%>, Let there be now an <S%H423>oath<s%> <S%H996>betwixt<s%> us, even <S%H996>betwixt<s%> us and thee, and let us <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with thee;

That thou wilt <S%H6213>do<s%> us no <S%H7451>hurt<s%>, as we have not <S%H5060>touched<s%> thee, and as we have <S%H6213>done<s%> unto thee nothing <S%H7535>but<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%>, and have sent thee <S%H7971>away<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%>: thou art <S%H6258>now<s%> the <S%H1288>blessed<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> them a <S%H4960>feast<s%>, and they did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%>.

And they rose up <S%H7925>betimes<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and <S%H7650>sware<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another<s%>: and <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> sent them <S%H7971>away<s%>, and they <S%H3212>departed<s%> from him in <S%H7965>peace<s%>.

And it came to pass the same <S%H3117>day<s%>, that <S%H3327>Isaac's<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H935>came<s%>, and <S%H5046>told<s%> him <S%H182>concerning<s%> the <S%H875>well<s%> which they had <S%H2658>digged<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, We have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>.
And he <S%H7121>called<s%> it <S%H7656>Shebah<s%>: therefore the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H884>Beer-sheba<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

¶ And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> was <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he <S%H3947>took<s%> to <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H3067>Judith<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H882>Beeri<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%>, and <S%H1315>Bashemath<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H356>Elon<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%>:
Which were a <S%H4786>grief<s%> of <S%H7307>mind<s%> unto <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> and to <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%>.
